column1: # The V-band luminosities for MAXI J1820+070 during MJD 58395-58440,
# which are derived by subtracting the estiamted exponential decay from the observed V-band luminosities
# See the methods section for the reduction procedure used to obtain these measurements.
# This file is used to plot the orange points in Panel (C) of Figure 2
# The columns are date in modified Julien date, luminosity and its error
#  The luminosity and its error are in erg/s
